nodes.text: Pogu was a Evocii male warrior during the Galactic War, when he could be found on the Sith Empire's Harrower-class dreadnought Ziost Shadow.

Evocii Avenger Pogu was added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic in Game Update 2.2, as a Nightmare Force Vendor for Operation: Scum and Villainy, though he was later removed in a reorganizing of endgame gear.
